name: Espresso
description: Rich, full-bodied espresso shot made from our signature blend of premium coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino
description: Perfect balance of espresso, steamed milk, and velvety foam, topped with a delicate dusting of cocoa.

nutritional.additionalInfo: Contains natural milk sugars, good source of calcium

name: Latte
description: Smooth espresso combined with steamed milk and a light layer of foam, creating a creamy delight.

nutritional.additionalInfo: Excellent source of protein and calcium

name: Americano
description: Bold espresso shots diluted with hot water, delivering a clean and robust coffee experience.

name: Mocha
description: Decadent blend of espresso, steamed milk, and rich chocolate, topped with whipped cream.

name: Green Tea
description: Refreshing premium green tea with delicate floral notes and antioxidant benefits.

nutritional.additionalInfo: High in antioxidants, naturally caffeine-free option available

name: Earl Grey
description: Classic black tea infused with bergamot oil, creating a sophisticated and aromatic blend.

nutritional.additionalInfo: Contains natural bergamot oil, moderate caffeine content

name: Chamomile Tea
description: Soothing herbal tea with calming properties, perfect for relaxation any time of day.

name: Croissant
description: Buttery, flaky pastry baked fresh daily with layers of golden, crispy perfection.

nutritional.additionalInfo: Made with real butter, contains refined carbohydrates

name: Chocolate Muffin
description: Moist, rich chocolate muffin loaded with chocolate chips and topped with a golden dome.

nutritional.additionalInfo: Contains chocolate chips, high in antioxidants from cocoa

name: Blueberry Scone
description: Traditional British scone studded with fresh blueberries and finished with a light glaze.

nutritional.additionalInfo: Contains fresh blueberries, source of vitamin C

name: Turkey Club Sandwich
description: Triple-decker sandwich with sliced turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on toasted bread.

nutritional.additionalInfo: High protein content, contains nitrates from processed meat

name: Avocado Toast
description: Artisanal sourdough topped with fresh avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a sprinkle of sea salt.

nutritional.additionalInfo: Rich in healthy monounsaturated fats, high fiber content

name: Grilled Cheese
description: Classic comfort food with melted cheese on golden, buttery grilled bread.

nutritional.additionalInfo: Good source of calcium and protein

name: Iced Coffee
description: Cold brew coffee served over ice with a smooth, refreshing finish perfect for warm days.

nutritional.additionalInfo: Cold brew method reduces acidity, naturally sweet

name: Matcha Latte
description: Premium ceremonial grade matcha whisked with steamed milk for a creamy, energizing beverage.

nutritional.additionalInfo: High in antioxidants, contains L-theanine for calm energy
